name: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
summary_text: Satyendra Mishra "Rajkumar Rao" and Aarti Shukla "Kriti Kharbanda" agree to get married arranged by their parents, after Satyendra Mishra get government job. Aarti Shukla, run away from their marriage. What life waits for them ahead?

name: Karan Arjun
summary_text: Karan and Arjun reincarnate in the different parts of the country. But the faith of their previous mother brings them together in order to avenge their death.

name: SpaceCamp
summary_text: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

name: Masculin Féminin
summary_text: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.

name: Singularity
summary_text: Earth 2020, 3/4 of it's households have a robot. The AI supercomputer, Kronos, considers humans the biggest threat to Earth. A century later, few humans are left. Calia seeks the last human stronghold as does Kronos.

name: Mirai
summary_text: A young boy encounters a magical garden which enables him to travel through time and meet his relatives from different eras, with guidance by his younger sister from the future.

name: The Place Promised in Our Early Days
summary_text: In an alternate postwar timeline, Japan is divided into the Union-controlled North and the US-controlled South.

name: Monkey Business
summary_text: A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.

name: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
summary_text: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

name: Erik the Viking
summary_text: Erik the Viking and his men travel across the sea to find Valhalla to ask the gods to end the Age of Ragnarok.

name: And So It Goes
summary_text: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

name: Cabin Fever 2: Spring Fever
summary_text: A high school prom faces a deadly threat: a flesh-eating virus that spreads via a popular brand of bottled water.

name: The Masque of the Red Death
summary_text: A European prince terrorizes the local peasantry while using his castle as a refuge against the "Red Death" plague that stalks the land.

name: The Chamber
summary_text: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

name: The House by the Cemetery
summary_text: A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.

name: Gantz: O
summary_text: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.

name: Youth Without Youth
summary_text: A love story wrapped in a mystery. Set in World War II Europe, a professor is changed by a cataclysmic event and explores the mysteries of life.

name: The Fortune Cookie
summary_text: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

name: For Love or Money
summary_text: Doug's a concierge at a luxury hotel on Manhattan. He saves all his tips towards his plan for a hotel. A potential investor seduces the girl, Doug loves, with false promises of leaving his wife. Doug's dilemma: hotel project or girl?

name: L'Age d'Or
summary_text: A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with each other, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.

name: All the Pretty Horses
summary_text: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

name: Falling in Love
summary_text: Although they live married lives, two strangers keep running into each other, starting a friendship that could blossom into so much more.

name: A.C.O.D.
summary_text: A grown man caught in the crossfire of his parents' 15-year divorce discovers he was unknowingly part of a study on divorced children and is enlisted in a follow-up years later, which wreaks new havoc on his family.

name: The Roaring Twenties
summary_text: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

name: Jalla! Jalla!
summary_text: Roro, a foreign worker in Swedish parks, loves his girlfriend but is about to marry another girl to prevent her from being sent back to Lebanon. Roros best friend, Måns, has his own ...                See full summary »

name: Werckmeister Harmonies
summary_text: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

name: Alex & Emma
summary_text: A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.

name: Skinwalkers
summary_text: A 12 year old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

name: Pit and the Pendulum
summary_text: In the sixteenth century, Francis Barnard travels to Spain to clarify the strange circumstances of his sister's death after she had married the son of a cruel Spanish Inquisitor.

name: The Hill
summary_text: In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.

name: Animal Factory
summary_text: A young man goes to prison and a tough, older convict takes him under his wing as a mentor.

name: The Hobbit
summary_text: A homebody hobbit in Middle Earth gets talked into joining a quest with a group of dwarves to recover their treasure from a dragon.

name: Educating Rita
summary_text: An alcoholic professor has been hired by a working-class girl for higher education.

name: Ginger Snaps 2: Unleashed
summary_text: Ginger's sister Brigitte, now a werewolf herself, must try to find a cure for her blood lust before the next full moon while hiding out in a rehab clinic from a relentless werewolf.

name: Brahms: The Boy II
summary_text: After a family moves into the Heelshire Mansion, their young son soon makes friends with a life-like doll called Brahms.

name: Stage Fright
summary_text: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high society entertainer.

name: Rosetta
summary_text: Young and impulsive Rosetta lives with her alcoholic mother and, moved by despair, she will do anything to maintain a job.

name: The Band's Visit
summary_text: A band comprised of members of the Egyptian police force head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town.

name: Beach Rats
summary_text: A Brooklyn teenager spends his days experimenting with drugs and looking online for older men to meet with.

name: Housefull
summary_text: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

name: Terminal Velocity
summary_text: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

name: Barbara
summary_text: A doctor working in 1980s East Germany finds herself banished to a small country hospital.

name: Our Little Sister
summary_text: A story that revolves around three sisters who live in their grandmother's home and the arrival of their thirteen-year-old half sister.

name: Rocket Science
summary_text: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

name: The Dream Team
summary_text: Four mental patients on a field trip in New York City must save their caring chaperon, who ends up being taken to a hospital in a coma after accidentally witnessing a murder, before the killers can find him and finish the job.

name: Yentl
summary_text: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

name: Earthquake Bird
summary_text: An enigmatic translator with a dark past is brought in for questioning after an ex-pat friend, who came between her and her photographer boyfriend, ends up missing and presumed dead.

name: Don't Knock Twice
summary_text: A mother desperate to reconnect with her troubled daughter becomes embroiled in the urban legend of a demonic witch.

name: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
summary_text: The wacky adventures of a young man who is willing to sacrifice his own love to insure the happiness of others, and get the girl-of-his-dreams married to the boy-of-her-dreams.

name: 24 Hours to Live
summary_text: An assassin seeks redemption after being given a second chance at life.

name: Even the Rain
summary_text: As a director and his crew shoot a controversial film about Christopher Columbus in Cochabamba, Bolivia, local people rise up against plans to privatize the water supply.

name: The Last Laugh
summary_text: An aging doorman is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbors and society after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious hotel.

name: My Favorite Martian
summary_text: A Martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

name: Possession
summary_text: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

name: The Last Metro
summary_text: In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Nazis while doing both of their jobs.

name: Shut In
summary_text: A widowed child psychologist lives an isolated existence in rural New England. Caught in a deadly winter storm, she must find a way to rescue a young boy before he disappears forever.

name: Switchback
summary_text: An FBI agent tries to catch a serial killer who kidnapped his son.

name: Gorky Park
summary_text: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

name: Mankatha
summary_text: Vinayak, a suspended cop, helps a group of four men rob cricket betting money amounting to 500 crores INR. When it comes to splitting the amount, betrayal hits the team hard and a chase ensues.

name: Avalon
summary_text: In a dystopian world, a woman spends her time playing an illegal and dangerous game, hoping to find meaning in her world.

name: Brat 2
summary_text: Arriving in Moscow, Danila discovers Konstantin dead and he sets out to avenge his death; a journey that leads him to Chicago and a whole new experience.

name: Nothing to Hide
summary_text: 3.5 couples meet for dinner party. The men have known each other for decades. After dinner they play a game of sharing texts, calls, e-mails etc. by placing all 7 cell phones on the table. Unexpected results as all have secrets.

name: Untamed Heart
summary_text: A waitress hardly notices a shy busboy who secretly loves her; until one night she's attacked and he comes to her rescue. From there a relationship sparks but one secret could mean disaster for these fated lovers.

name: Italiensk for begyndere
summary_text: Several lonely hearts in a semi-provincial suburb of a town in Denmark use a beginner's course in Italian as the platform to meet the romance of their lives.

name: The Mechanic
summary_text: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

name: Pokiri
summary_text: A local goon's killer instincts earn him his girlfriend's disapproval, a corrupt cop's enmity and a wanted don's attention.

name: All About the Benjamins
summary_text: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.

name: Von Ryan's Express
summary_text: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

name: Biker Boyz
summary_text: A son of the leader of a legendary group of an urban biker gang tries to retain his championship title.

name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
summary_text: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

name: The Lie
summary_text: A father and daughter are on their way to dance camp when they spot the girl's best friend on the side of the road. When they stop to offer the friend a ride, their good intentions soon result in terrible consequences.

name: Limonata
summary_text: So begins an entertaining road story where we witness two brothers with different cultural backgrounds, who don't even know each other, have similarities, differences and even their fights.

name: Something to Talk About
summary_text: A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

name: Beauty & the Briefcase
summary_text: A freelance writer looking for romance sells a story to Cosmopolitan magazine about finding love in the workplace and goes undercover at a Finance Company.

name: A Christmas Carol
summary_text: An old bitter miser who rationalizes his uncaring nature learns real compassion when three spirits visit him on Christmas Eve.

name: Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town
summary_text: A mailman reveals the origin of Santa Claus.

name: Intacto
summary_text: In a world where luck can be taken from a lucky person by a luckier person's touch, a small group of lucky people compete to be the luckiest and for the other contestants' luck.

name: The Crossing Guard
summary_text: Freddy Gale is a seedy jeweller who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.

name: Organize Isler: Sazan Sarmali
summary_text: Asim Noyan swindles people with his lies and games. Asim Noyan and his gang, who no one else has been able to catch, gets into a ruse again.

name: I Am Not an Easy Man
summary_text: A shameless chauvinist gets a taste of his own medicine when he wakes up in a world dominated by women and locks horns with a powerful female author.

name: Slaughterhouse Rulez
summary_text: An illustrious British boarding school becomes a bloody battleground when a mysterious sinkhole appears at a nearby fracking site unleashing unspeakable horror.

name: Split Second
summary_text: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

name: In the Army Now
summary_text: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.

name: Vaastav: The Reality
summary_text: Consequences force an innocent man to get involved in crime after making an error.

name: Cookie's Fortune
summary_text: Conflict arises in the small town of Holly Springs when an old woman's death causes a variety of reactions among family and friends.

name: A Fall from Grace
summary_text: Disheartened since her ex-husband's affair, Grace Waters feels restored by a new romance. But when secrets erode her short-lived joy, Grace's vulnerable side turns violent.

name: Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky
summary_text: A young man with superhuman strength is incarcerated at a prison run by corrupt officials and seeks to use his martial arts to clean up the system.

name: Blue Steel
summary_text: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.

name: Talk Radio
summary_text: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

name: Something New
summary_text: Kenya McQueen, an accountant finds love in the most unexpected place when she agrees to go on a blind date with Brian Kelly, a sexy and free-spirited landscaper.

name: Black Butterfly
summary_text: A reclusive screenwriter takes in a lonely drifter, who is determined to repay his kindness by helping him finish his story.

name: The Three Caballeros
summary_text: Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican Charro Rooster).

name: Stan Helsing
summary_text: A spoof on many horror movie series. Ending his shift at the video rental, Stan's picked up by his BFF and 2 cute girls, all going to a Halloween party. Will they even get there?

name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
summary_text: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

name: Meek's Cutoff
summary_text: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

name: Owning Mahowny
summary_text: A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.

name: Unplanned
summary_text: All Abby Johnson ever wanted to do was help women. As one of the youngest Planned Parenthood clinic directors in the nation, she believed in a woman's right to choose. Until the day she saw something that changed everything.

name: Girl
summary_text: A promising teenage dancer enrolls at a prestigious ballet school while grappling with her gender dysphoria.

name: Tekkonkinkreet
summary_text: 2 boys defend Treasure Town. Yakuza try to take over and clear it for new development.

name: Lady Snowblood
summary_text: A strikingly beautiful young woman is raised from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

name: Only Angels Have Wings
summary_text: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract.

name: Jongens
summary_text: A sexually awakening gay teen athlete finds himself in a budding relationship with his mutually attracted relay race teammate.

name: The Goodbye Girl
summary_text: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

name: 16 Wishes
summary_text: Abby's made a 16 wishes list for her 16th birthday. She gets 16 magic candles - 1 wish per hour. Things are fine in the beginning.

name: Weekend at Bernie's II
summary_text: Larry and Richard use a voodoo-revived corpse to track down hidden money to clear their names.

name: Valmont
summary_text: France before 1789: When a widow hears that her lover is to marry her cousin's daughter, she asks the playboy Valmont to take the girl's virginity. But first she bets him, with her body as prize, to seduce a virtuous, young, married woman.

name: High School High
summary_text: Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.

name: Thank You for Your Service
summary_text: A group of U.S. soldiers returning from Iraq struggle to integrate back into family and civilian life, while living with the memory of a war that threatens to destroy them long after they've left the battlefield.

name: Excess Baggage
summary_text: A bratty teenager fakes her own kidnapping, but gets mistakenly kidnapped for real instead.

name: The Lovers on the Bridge
summary_text: Alex, who's homeless and addicted to alcohol, and Michèle, who's losing her sight, form a relationship while sleeping rough on Paris's Pont-Neuf bridge.

name: The Women
summary_text: A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.

name: Kader
summary_text: Bekir loves Ugur, who loves Zagor, who is about to get out of jail. An already tense love triangle is thrown into turmoil on a hot summer night, when Zagor kills someone, and Ugur disappears.

name: Macbeth
summary_text: A ruthlessly ambitious Scottish lord seizes the throne with the help of his scheming wife and a trio of witches.

name: King Solomon's Mines
summary_text: Fortune hunter Allan Quatermain teams up with a resourceful woman to help her find her missing father lost in the wilds of 1900s Africa while being pursued by hostile tribes and a rival German explorer.

name: The Front Page
summary_text: A ruthless editor tries to get his top reporter to cover one more crime story before retirement.

name: The Petrified Forest
summary_text: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
summary_text: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

name: White Noise 2: The Light
summary_text: Following the loss of his family, a man attempts suicide only to discover upon waking that he can identify people who are about to die

name: Say It Isn't So
summary_text: Jo and Gilly date. They find out they're brother and sister. Jo moves away. Gilly finds out that he's not Jo's brother and that Jo's getting married. Can he stop the wedding in time?

name: Trapped in Paradise
summary_text: Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.

name: Ring 2
summary_text: Reiko takes Yôichi into hiding when her son begins to display frightening powers. Meanwhile, Mai Takano and the authorities begin a desperate search for them, as the mysterious Ring curse spreads.

name: Nine Dead
summary_text: Nine strangers are kidnapped and forced to figure out the connection they have to each other as one has to die every ten minutes.

name: A Few Best Men
summary_text: A groom and his three best men travel to the Australian outback for a wedding.

name: Joe's Apartment
summary_text: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

name: Attack on Titan Part 1
summary_text: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.

name: Delicacy
summary_text: A French woman mourning over the death of her husband three years prior is courted by a Swedish co-worker.

name: The Villainess
summary_text: A female assassin leaves a trail of bodies behind her as she seeks revenge.

name: Dookudu
summary_text: Ajay, (Mahesh Babu) an undercover cop, is assigned to catch a dangerous mafia don with whom he has a personal score to settle.

name: Outcast
summary_text: A mysterious warrior teams up with the daughter and son of a deposed Chinese Emperor to defeat their cruel brother, who seeks their deaths.

name: Bagdad Cafe
summary_text: A lonely German woman ends up in the most desolate motel on Earth and decides to make it brighter.

name: Yol
summary_text: When five Kurdish prisoners are granted one week's home leave, they find to their dismay that they face continued oppression outside of prison from their families, the culture, and the government.

name: Hatchet II
summary_text: Marybeth escapes the clutches of the bayou-butcher Victor Crowley and returns to the swamp with an army of hunters and gunmen, determined to end Crowley's reign of horror once and for all.

name: Desert Flower
summary_text: Waris Dirie, born 1965 in Somalia, flees at 13 when sold as 4th wife. She's maid at the Somalian embassy in London, then McDonald's, where she's discovered and becomes int'l top model. 1997, she speaks up against female genital mutilation.

name: Bad Boy Bubby
summary_text: Bubby has spent thirty years trapped in the same small room, tricked by his mother. One day, he manages to escape, and, deranged and naive in equal measures, his adventure into the modern and nihilistic life begins.

name: She's Gotta Have It
summary_text: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

name: Cry Freedom
summary_text: South African journalist Donald Woods is forced to flee the country, after attempting to investigate the death in custody of his friend, the black activist Steve Biko.

name: Flåklypa Grand Prix
summary_text: Reodor Felgen decides that he will enter a car race to defeat his former friend who has stolen his plans for a car.

name: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
summary_text: After a heroic death, a firefighter navigates the afterlife with the help of three guides.

name: The Substitute
summary_text: Mercenary Shale's team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

name: The Breed
summary_text: A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.

name: Utøya: July 22
summary_text: A teenage girl struggles to survive and to find her younger sister during the July 2011 terrorist mass murder at a political summer camp on the Norwegian island of Utøya.

name: Things to Come
summary_text: A philosophy teacher soldiers through the death of her mother, losing her book deal, and dealing with a husband who is cheating on her.

name: Nowhere in Africa
summary_text: A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930s Kenya.

name: Threesome
summary_text: A girl named Alex is by mistake housed with 2 guys, Stuart and Eddy, in a college dorm suite. After initial problems they become friends. Stuart has the hots for Alex, Alex for Eddy and Eddy for Stuart. Can it work?

name: Kevin & Perry Go Large
summary_text: Two inseparable, hormonal, English BFF teen boys, avoided by all others, head to Ibiza with Kevin's parents. Will they lose their virginity there?

name: Hope and Glory
summary_text: Bill, a young boy living on the outskirts of London experiences the exhilaration of World War II. During this period, Bill learns about sex, death, love, hypocrisy, and the faults of adults as he prowls the ruins of bombed houses.

name: Shame
summary_text: In the midst of a civil war, former violinists Jan and Eva Rosenberg, who have a tempestuous marriage, run a farm on a rural island. In spite of their best efforts to escape their homeland, the war impinges on every aspect of their lives.

name: Perfect Strangers
summary_text: Seven lifelong friends, a dinner, a blood red moon eclipse, a game involving to read the seven cell phones' incoming messages. A night where anything that can be bad will be very bad.

name: Howl
summary_text: As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.

name: Mou gaan dou III: Jung gik mou gaan
summary_text: Months after the events of the original film, Ming suspects a police superintendent as being a new mole for the triads, while years earlier, Yan embarks on his first mission.

name: Holiday in the Wild
summary_text: Jilted by her husband on the eve of embarking on an African safari, a woman travels to the continent alone where she meets an elephant conservationist.

name: Paheli
summary_text: A folk tale - supernatural love story about a ghost who falls in love with a newlywed woman.

name: The Deaths of Ian Stone
summary_text: An all-American guy is murdered each day by horrifying pursuers, only to wake up in slightly different lives to experience the terror of being murdered again.

name: Yoga Hosers
summary_text: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.

name: Dhobi Ghat
summary_text: The lives of four people intersect in Mumbai: a washer-man who wants to become an actor, a banker-turned-photographer, a painter looking for inspiration, and a newly-married immigrant who journals her experiences on home video.

name: Stealing Harvard
summary_text: A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.

name: RangiTaranga
summary_text: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

name: The Marriage of Maria Braun
summary_text: Maria marries Hermann Braun in the last days of World War II, only for him to go missing in the war. Alone, Maria puts to use her beauty and ambition in order to find prosperity during Germany's "economic miracle" of the 1950s.

name: Kika
summary_text: Kika, a cute cosmetologist, prepares Ramon for funeral when he revives. He proposes to the much older Kika who has his dad as lover. Did Ramon's dad murder his mom? What about the escaped rapist and the PSYCHOlogist video reporter?

name: Antiviral
summary_text: In a blackly satirical near future, a thriving industry sells celebrity illnesses to their obsessed fans. Employee Syd March's attempts to exploit the system backfire when they involve him in a potentially deadly mystery.

name: Iftarlik Gazoz
summary_text: In early 1970s, Adem is a boy living in an Aegean village with his family. He just finished the primary school and he wants to work while he's on summer holiday. He gets permission from his...                See full summary »

name: Smiles of a Summer Night
summary_text: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

name: Al final del túnel
summary_text: A paraplegic computer engineer in a wheelchair starts hearing noises and voices of bank robbers in his basement.

name: Versus
summary_text: There are 666 portals that connect this world to the other side. These are concealed from all human beings. Somewhere in Japan exists the 444th portal.... The forest of resurrection.

name: The Ladies Man
summary_text: The Saturday Night Live (1975) character gets a big screen treatment.

name: Itirazim Var
summary_text: There is a murder while at prayer. Selman Bulut, the imam of mosque, starts to investigate the murder and faces with people in the neighborhood.

name: Yes Boss
summary_text: Rahul Joshi wants to be a successful businessman so he works hard for his boss Siddharth. One day Rahul meets Seema, an up and coming model, and he feels like he's finally met his match. Will Seema fall for Rahul?

name: Big Business
summary_text: Two couples of sisters from New York and from the countryside discover that they are connected in an incredible way.

name: Tetro
summary_text: Bennie travels to Buenos Aires to find his long-missing older brother, a once-promising writer who is now a remnant of his former self. Bennie's discovery of his brother's near-finished play might hold the answer to understanding their shared past and renewing their bond.

name: Undead
summary_text: A quaint Australian fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the ravenous undead, leaving a small group of those unharmed to find a way out.

name: Chopping Mall
summary_text: A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.

name: Corky Romano
summary_text: The loser son of a Mafia honcho must go undercover for the FBI.

name: Ronal the Barbarian
summary_text: The 100 Barbarian Sons of Krull get attacked by a superior force and captured. It's up to the young, weak but smart Ronal to free them. 3 join his dangerous quest.

name: The Oranges
summary_text: The enduring friendship between the Walling and Ostroff families is tested when Nina, the prodigal Ostroff daughter, returns home for the holidays after a five-year absence and enters into an affair with David, head of the Walling family.

name: Filantropica
summary_text: Ovidiu, a high-school teacher looking for an extra buck, finds an unexpected way to earn easy money.

name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
summary_text: Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers.

name: Astérix: Le domaine des dieux
summary_text: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.

name: Paint Your Wagon
summary_text: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

name: Youngblood
summary_text: A 17 year old farm boy is offered an ice hockey tryout. His brother drives him to Canada. He has fast legs, slow fists, but is chosen. Will he learn to use his fists and play ice hockey the Canuck way? Will he get the coach's cute daughter?

name: Radio Flyer
summary_text: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.

name: Swing Time
summary_text: Roguish gambler/dancer "Lucky" Garnett is challenged by his fiance's father to come up with $25,000 to prove he's worthy of her hand. But after he falls in love with a dance instructor, Lucky'll do anything to keep from earning the bucks.

name: The Outrage
summary_text: The boss of a major crime syndicate orders his lieutenant to bring a rogue gang of drug traffickers in line, a job that gets passed on to his long-suffering subordinate.

name: Little Nicholas
summary_text: Nicholas has every reason to keep things in life unchanged; however, when he accidentally overhears mum and dad talking about a new baby brother, his world will turn upside down. Will they abandon him to make room for the little stranger?

name: Stolen Kisses
summary_text: After being discharged from the army, Antoine Doinel centers a screwball comedy where he applies for different jobs and tries to make sense of his relationships with women.

name: Captain Alatriste: The Spanish Musketeer
summary_text: Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.

name: Black Christmas
summary_text: A group of female students is stalked by a stranger during their Christmas break. That is until the young sorority pledges discover that the killer is part of an underground college conspiracy.

name: Something the Lord Made
summary_text: A dramatization of the relationship between heart surgery pioneers Alfred Blalock and Vivien Thomas.

name: Threads
summary_text: The effects of a nuclear holocaust on the working class city of Sheffield, England and the eventual long-term effects of nuclear war on civilization.

name: Wo de fu qin mu qin
summary_text: Prompted by the death of his father and the grief of his mother, a man recalls the story of how they met in flashback.

name: Chachi 420
summary_text: Desperation to be with his only child forces a divorced man to take the guise of the child's nanny. Situations get really messy when the child's grandfather (the man's ex-father-in-law) falls in love with his disguised ex-son-in-law.

name: Goon: Last of the Enforcers
summary_text: A hockey player plagued by injuries is confronted with the possibility of retirement when a tough new player challenges his status as the league's top enforcer.

name: Graduation
summary_text: A film about compromises and the implications of the parent's role.

name: Coming Home
summary_text: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

name: Kelebekler
summary_text: In a Turkish village, three siblings who neither know each other nor anything about their late father, wait to bury his body. As they start to find out more about their father and each other, they also start to learn more about themselves.

name: Galveston
summary_text: After escaping a set up, a dying hitman returns to his hometown of Galveston where he plans his revenge.

name: Flash Point
summary_text: A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang, after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.

name: Fireflies in the Garden
summary_text: The Taylor family is devastated by an accident that takes place on the day their matriarch is due to graduate from college -- decades after leaving to raise her children.

name: Jamón, Jamón
summary_text: When a mother disapproves of her son's lover, she hires an underwear model and former bullfighter to seduce her away.

name: Kites
summary_text: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

name: Corrina, Corrina
summary_text: In 1959, a widower hires a kindly housekeeper/nanny to care for his seven-year-old daughter.

name: The Angel
summary_text: Based on NYT bestselling book 'The Angel: The Egyptian Spy Who Saved Israel' by Uri Bar-Joseph.

name: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
summary_text: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

name: Kaboom
summary_text: A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his class-mates -- with him at the center.

name: The Abandoned
summary_text: An adopted woman returns to her home country and the family home that she never knew and must face the mystery that lies there.

name: Not Without My Daughter
summary_text: An American woman, trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutish husband, must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.

name: Rebound
summary_text: An acclaimed college basketball coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.

name: The French Lieutenant's Woman
summary_text: Anna and Mike portray two characters in a film set in 19th century England who fall in love despite the fact that Mike's character is engaged.

name: Venus
summary_text: Life for a pair of veteran actors gets turned upside down after they meet a brash teenager.

name: Point Blank
summary_text: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

name: The Hater
summary_text: A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.

name: The Pillow Book
summary_text: A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

name: The Funhouse
summary_text: Four teenagers visit a local carnival for a night of innocent amusement. They soon discover, however, that there is nothing innocent or amusing there at all.

name: Iklimler
summary_text: A dowdy university instructor Isa is an inattentive husband to his younger, TV-business wife Bahar. Self-absorbed and selfish, Isa only communicates in the most rudimentary way, while she, similarly, detaches into crying jags and juvenile behavior.

name: Juliet of the Spirits
summary_text: Visions, memories, and mysticism all help a 40-something woman to find the strength to leave her cheating husband.

name: The Clan
summary_text: The true story of the Puccio Clan, a family who kidnapped and killed people in the 80s.

name: My Neighbors the Yamadas
summary_text: The life and misadventures of a family in contemporary Japan.

name: Section 375
summary_text: A celebrated Bollywood director Rohan Khurana stands accused by a female member of his crew, Anjali Dangle of having raped her at his residence.

name: Ninja
summary_text: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

name: Best of the Best
summary_text: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country - can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

name: Welcome to the Jungle
summary_text: A company retreat on a tropical island goes terribly awry.

name: Cherry Falls
summary_text: In the small town of Cherry Falls, a psychotic murderer is killing off the virgins of the local high school.

name: Uncle Drew
summary_text: An anti-ageist comedy about a man's dream to win the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem.

name: Aankhen
summary_text: After a temperamental man is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. He trains three blind men to do this risky task for him.

name: Bang Bang You're Dead
summary_text: Trevor is a troubled high school student, thanks to the effects of bullying. This is the story of his fight to break free.

name: In Dreams
summary_text: A suburban housewife learns that she has a dreamworld connection to a serial murderer, and must stop him from killing again.

name: Wuthering Heights
summary_text: A man becomes obsessed with vengeance when his soul mate marries another man.

name: The Hummingbird Project
summary_text: A pair of high-frequency traders go up against their old boss in an effort to make millions in a fiber-optic cable deal.

name: Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
summary_text: Director Michael Winterbottom (Northam) attempts to shoot the adaptation of Laurence Sterne's essentially unfilmable novel, "The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman."

name: Henry & June
summary_text: Anaïs Nin meets the American writer, Henry Miller, in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening which includes Henry and his wife, June.

name: The Librarian: The Curse of the Judas Chalice
summary_text: Losing his girlfriend because he was at an auction dramatically getting the magical philosopher's stone instead of a date, he needs a vacation - New Orleans but finds himself busy saving Earth from the curse of the Judas chalice/vampires.

name: The Mighty
summary_text: Two young boys, both social outcasts in their small town, form an unlikely friendship.

name: The World of Apu
summary_text: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.

name: Recount
summary_text: A chronicle of the weeks after the 2000 U.S. Presidential election, and the subsequent recounts in Florida.

name: Great Expectations
summary_text: A series of events change the orphaned Pip's life forever as he eagerly abandons his humble origins to begin a new life as a gentleman.

name: Becky
summary_text: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

name: Two for the Road
summary_text: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

name: Timer
summary_text: If a clock could count down to the moment you meet your soul mate, would you want to know?

name: The Only Living Boy in New York
summary_text: Adrift in New York City, a recent college graduate's life is upended by his father's mistress.

name: Red Road
summary_text: Jackie works as a CCTV operator. Each day she watches over a small part of the world, protecting the people living their lives under her gaze. One day a man appears on her monitor, a man she thought she would never see again, a man she never wanted to see again. Now she has no choice, she is compelled to confront him.

name: Teorema
summary_text: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

name: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
summary_text: Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves.

name: The Fool
summary_text: Dima Nikitin is an ordinary honest plumber who suddenly decides to face the corrupt system of local politics in order to save the lives of 800 inhabitants of an old dormitory, which is about to collapse.

name: Deathtrap
summary_text: A Broadway playwright puts murder in his plan to take credit for a student's play.

name: Get Real
summary_text: A tenderly romantic coming-of-age story as two boys in a British school fall in love.

name: They
summary_text: A psychology student finds all her childhood fears and phobias becoming real after a traumatic event.

name: Going Overboard
summary_text: A struggling young comedian takes a menial job on a cruise ship hoping for his big chance to make it in the world of cruise-ship comedy.

name: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
summary_text: Remake of the 1956 film noir film "Beyond a Reasonable Doubt" in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt district attorney takes an unexpected turn.

name: The Naked City
summary_text: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

name: Life Is a Miracle
summary_text: What could be better for the village than a scenic railway to bring in the tourists? What could be worse for tourism than war? Luka builds the railway and shuts his eyes to war. Then Luka's wife runs off with a musician and his son is called up to the army. Luka's life is a war zone. Then he meets Sabaha..

name: A Dog's Will
summary_text: João Grilo and Chicó are two very poor and clever Brazilian Northeasterners who struggle for survival and trick people to get by. After meeting the wealthy Rosinha, both hope to finally ...                See full summary »
